wikipedia_page.main: Harold Hall (1887 – after 1911), also known as Harry Hall, was an English professional footballer who played for Rotherham Town, Huddersfield Town and Grimsby Town.Three of his brothers, Ben, Ellis and Fretwell, also played in the Football League.
